forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A clear sky. Low 29F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low near 30F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. High 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early. Breaks in the overcast later. Low -2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers before midnight. Becoming partly cloudy later. Low 28F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early changing to mixed rain and snow later in the day. High 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early changing to mixed rain and snow later in the day. High 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers around early. Clear skies later. Low -4C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers around early. Clear skies later. Low near 25F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 43F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy later with any flurries or snow showers ending by midnight. Low -6C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: On and off snow showers early. Breaks in the overcast later. Low 22F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 30%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 2C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 36F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low -8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 18F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 39F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies with late-night snow showers. Low -9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Snow showers around after midnight. Low 16F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. High 4C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. High 39F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. Low around -15C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. 12-20cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low near 5F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 5 to 8 inches.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. High 3C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. High 38F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low -13C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 8F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.
